title: Best Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '150g butter or margarine', '150g caster or granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 medium eggs', '150g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', 'For the filling', '200ml double or whipping cream cream', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g strawberry jam', 'icing sugar (optional)']
